name: Rooster
description:
Birth years: 1945, 1957, 1969, 1981, 1993, 2005, 2017, 2029.

Personality traits: Adventurous, charitable, funny, loyal, argumentative, boastful, self-involved.

KALEIDOROSCOPE comes from the 12 signs the Chinese Horoscope, each with his own colour (soil, fire, metal, water or wood) each with its own unique kaleidoscope, his unrepeatable configuration, different from that of another, rare and precious as every living being is. With this first project, I would like to represent how loss of contacts between human beings during the last 2 years moved the humanity to a big physical distance. With this tribute to the “Adam’s creation”, I would like to reminds us who we are, either human beings, monkeys or roosters… All of us part of the same connected universe.
